Welcome to A Nerd’s World. For over 15 years our team has brought a spark to brands around the world. We are extremely passionate about what we do and have always put our clients first. From the initial meet to the finish line, our team’s uniquely personal attention will keep you in the loop as your creative experience unfolds. We are not your typical nerds, we have a lust for life and a passion for creation. We look forward to the opportunity to work with you and welcome you to our world.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Best Regards,[/vc_column_text][vc_single_image image=”26264″ img_size=”252×45″ css=”.vc_custom_1579904896518{margin-top: 5px !important;margin-bottom: 5px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1592900736685{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”]Chris & Grace Hughes
Founders of A Nerd’s World[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”10″ el_class=”dondon”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1591374869914{padding-top: 10px !important;padding-bottom: 16px !important;background-color: #ff9d00 !important;}” el_class=”home-services vc-no-bottom-margin custom-work-portfolio”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1580320661543{padding-top: 0px !important;}”][vc_empty_space height=”40″ el_class=”dondon”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1638250492079{margin-bottom: 10px !important;}”]

WEBSITE DESIGN

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”2/3″][vc_column_text]

We may not have met yet, but you’ve probably bumped into some of our work. Just below this paragraph you will find a hand selected taste test of our portfolio. Remember we’ve been in business since 2006 and have thousands of projects to show off but we don’t want to overwhelm you on our homepage.

 SEARCH ENGINE OPTIMIZATION

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”15″ css=”.vc_custom_1580250829572{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/12″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”5/6″][vc_column_text]

Did you know that we rank #1 on Google? We provide in-house white hat Search Engine Optimization services that have stood the test of time – since 2006 to be exact. Our custom Toronto SEO strategies are extremely powerful and proven to rank your website at the top of Google. Serious business owners hire us and our trusted team of in-house nerds for real results. It’s that simple.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/12″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” el_class=”home-services vc-no-bottom-margin” css=”.vc_custom_1580233655034{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column offset=”vc_hidden-xs”][vc_single_image image=”27061″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center” onclick=”custom_link” link=”https://anerdsworld.com/seo-toronto”][/vc_column][vc_column offset=”vc_hidden-lg vc_hidden-md vc_hidden-sm”][vc_single_image image=”26324″ img_size=”full”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” el_class=”home-services vc-no-bottom-margin” css=”.vc_custom_1580322735599{padding-top: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;background-color: #f7f7f7 !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1580322227086{padding-top: 0px !important;}”][vc_empty_space height=”10″ el_class=”shosho”][vc_empty_space height=”30″ el_class=”dondon”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1579031209750{margin-bottom: 10px !important;}”]

3 STEPS TO A HIGHER RANK ON GOOGLE

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”15″][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”2/3″][vc_column_text]

We live and breathe Search Engine Optimization. No really, we do. We ditched the smoke and mirrors, secret Search Engine Optimization recipes to success and decided very early on to be the best at what we do. We used our talents, to create our values, our structure, process and custom digital marketing strategies. Creating an in-house culture, that lets these behaviours and actions live and grow. It sounds simple, but it really works. We’re living proof!

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”50″][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” gap=”10″][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1580234298909{padding-top: 12% !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 10% !important;padding-left: 10% !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}” offset=”vc_hidden-xs”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1579032208862{margin-top: -100px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”]

1

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

SCHEDULE A CALL

When you’re not seeing the Google rankings and the success you want in your business, it’s time to talk to an SEO guru.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1580234306033{padding-top: 12% !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 10% !important;padding-left: 10% !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}” offset=”vc_hidden-xs”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1579032312693{margin-top: -100px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”]

2

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

CUSTOM STRATEGY

During the call, talk about your goals. Before you hang up, you’ll have the outline to a strategy that will lead you to top rankings.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1580234317056{padding-top: 12% !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 10% !important;padding-left: 10% !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}” offset=”vc_hidden-xs”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1579032230345{margin-top: -100px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”]

3

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

HIGHER RANKINGS!

Start generating more traffic and more interest in your business. It’s 2020 and time to get a positive return on your investment.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_empty_space height=”-30″ el_class=”shosho”][vc_empty_space height=”30″ el_class=”dondon”][vc_btn title=”SEARCH ENGINE OPTIMIZATION TORONTO” style=”flat” shape=”square” color=”warning” align=”center” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fanerdsworld.com%2Fseo-toronto|||”][vc_empty_space height=”30″ el_class=”dondon”][vc_empty_space height=”10″ el_class=”shosho”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1624659023583{padding-top: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 10px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}”][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”30″ el_class=”dondon”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1638249525390{margin-bottom: 10px !important;}”]

LOGO DESIGN

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”15″][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”2/3″][vc_column_text]

At A Nerd’s World, you’re not just buying a new logo.  You’re investing in a whole creative process that always begins with a pencil and paper. Our proven custom logo design process, driven by our talented team of designers has made us an award winning Toronto based logo design company with experience in various styles, across all industries, throughout the world.  Our logo designers create 100% unique designs from scratch, resulting in a memorable masterpiece to proudly represent your visually brand identity.  No shortcuts, no templates, no clip-art, no nonsense.

el_class=”dondon”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1638287235363{margin-bottom: 10px !important;}”]

NEW ONLINE COURSES

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”15″][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”2/3″][vc_column_text]

Why should you invest in online learning? In this rapidly evolving world, continuous learning is the best way to adapt to these changes. Corporates and educational institutions are moving away from the traditional brick-and-mortar learning systems to faster and efficient e-learning systems.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”50″][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” gap=”10″][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1580234298909{padding-top: 12% !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 10% !important;padding-left: 10% !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}” offset=”vc_hidden-xs”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1638288086655{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1640016666124{margin-top: 20px !important;}”]

ULTIMATE SEO TRAINING

The most comprehensive, step-by-step SEO training that money can buy. My course is designed for entrepreneurs who want to learn the fundamentals of SEO with proven, actionable techniques.

[/vc_column_text][vc_btn title=”ULTIMATE SEO TRAINING” style=”flat” shape=”square” color=”warning” align=”center” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fanerdsworld.com%2Fseo-training%2F|||” css=”.vc_custom_1638288068040{margin-top: 20px !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1580234306033{padding-top: 12% !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 10% !important;padding-left: 10% !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}” offset=”vc_hidden-xs”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1640016631947{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1640016802379{margin-top: 20px !important;}”]

MILLION DOLLAR SELLER

Our new Million Dollar Sellers course is for those interested in making more money. Increase your competitive edge in today’s economy by sharpening your sales acumen. We will walk you through our sales strategy.

[/vc_column_text][vc_btn title=”MILLION DOLLAR SELLER” style=”flat” shape=”square” color=”warning” align=”center” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fanerdsworld.com%2Fmillion-dollar-sellers-guide|||” css=”.vc_custom_1640016814048{margin-top: 20px !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1580234317056{padding-top: 12% !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 10% !important;padding-left: 10% !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}” offset=”vc_hidden-xs”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1638288122405{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1640016696008{margin-top: 20px !important;}”]

BUILD A WEB DESIGN BUSINESS

Starting a web design and development business doesn’t have to be difficult, as my handcrafted step-by-step course makes it as easy as possible to build a profitable business – I’m here to help!

[/vc_column_text][vc_btn title=”BUILD A WEB DESIGN BUSINESS” style=”flat” shape=”square” color=”warning” align=”center” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fanerdsworld.com%2Fultimate-guide-to-starting-a-web-design-business|||” css=”.vc_custom_1638287821229{margin-top: 20px !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_empty_space height=”-30″ el_class=”shosho”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]
